name: Spontaneous Sparks
description: Creative, fun indoor dares and micro-experiences. Spontaneous, playful, and designed for immediate action.

prompts.text: Build a pillow fort together and take 10 minutes to just relax inside.
What's something you want to do with your partner that you've never tried?
Cook a meal together where you feed each other bites and rate each other's cooking.
What's the most spontaneous thing you've done together that you loved?
Create an indoor picnic with snacks, music, and candles. Take 15 minutes to enjoy it together.
What activity makes you both laugh the hardest together?
Challenge each other to a fun game—board game, video game, or cards—loser picks next activity.
When was the last time you did something adventurous together?
Have a photo shoot together—dress up or get creative, then look through the pictures together.
What's your favorite way to spend a lazy Sunday together?
Create a signature cocktail or mocktail together and give it a romantic name.
What's the most fun date idea you haven't suggested yet?
Have an indoor treasure hunt where you hide love notes or small gifts around your space.
What adventure do you want to go on with your partner?
Create a playlist together of songs that mean something to your relationship.
What's the most spontaneous date you'd love your partner to plan for you?
Put on a fashion show for each other—try on different outfits and rate each other honestly.
What's the most memorable date you've had together?
Teach each other something you're good at—cooking, dancing, a skill, anything.
What's something new you'd like to try together?
